attributes.action: Ban the use of non-biodegradable packaging for supermarket produce.
attributes.additional_details:
The effects of plastic pollution are widely recognised and scientifically proven to harm the environment, animals and humans.

https://www.greenpeace.org.uk/news/supermarket-plastic-league-table-rankings/
attributes.background:
To legislate that only biodegradable packaging should be used to pack all supermarket produce; i.e. fresh fruit, vegetables and herbs.
Supermarket plastic is an unnecessary major contributor to non-biodegradable waste polluting our planet and damaging human and animal health.
